info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:29PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Vernon Parish through 445 PM CDT... At 428 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Leesville, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
